title: Episode 20: Delivery Complete
text: 1. [SECURE] Robot picks up mart-pink-hat in pod at hall-b
2. Robot moves with mart-pink-hat in pod: hall-b -> maintenance-tunnel
3. Robot moves with mart-pink-hat in pod: maintenance-tunnel -> hall-a
4. UNLOAD mart-pink-hat from pod at hall-a
• Action Result: UNLOAD mart-pink-hat from pod at hall-a
